text: He said to me, “Son of man, eat what you see in front of you—eat this scroll—and then go and speak to the house of Israel.”
So I opened my mouth and he fed me the scroll.
He said to me, “Son of man, feed your stomach and fill your belly with this scroll I am giving to you.” So I ate it, and it was sweet like honey in my mouth.
He said to me, “Son of man, go to the house of Israel and speak my words to them.

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> being <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="06012" class="">unintelligible</st> <st data-num="08193" class="">speech</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03515" class="">difficult</st> <st data-num="03956" class="">language</st>,<n id="2" /> but<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>—

<st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> of <st data-num="06012" class="">unintelligible</st> <st data-num="08193" class="">speech</st> and <st data-num="03515" class="">difficult</st> <st data-num="03956" class="">language</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> you <st data-num="03808" class="">cannot</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">understand</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0518 03808">Surely if</st><n id="2" /> I had <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> you <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> would <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you!
But the house of Israel is unwilling to listen to you, because they are not willing to listen to me, for the whole house of Israel is hardheaded and hardhearted.
“I have made your face adamant to match their faces, and your forehead hard to match their foreheads.
I have made your forehead harder than flint—like diamond! Do not fear them or be terrified of the looks they give you, for they are a rebellious house.”
And he said to me, “Son of man, take all my words that I speak to you to heart and listen carefully.
Go to the exiles, to your fellow countrymen, and speak to them. Say to them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says,’ whether they pay attention or not.”
Then a wind lifted me up and I heard a great rumbling sound behind me as the glory of the Lord rose from its place,

and the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of the <st data-num="02416" class="">living beings’</st> <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> <st data-num="05401" class="">brushing</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">each</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">other</st>, and the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of the <st data-num="0212" class="">wheels</st> <st data-num="05980" class="">alongside</st> them, a <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="07494" class="">rumbling</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st>.
A wind lifted me up and carried me away. I went bitterly, my spirit full of fury, and the hand of the Lord rested powerfully on me.
I came to the exiles at Tel Abib, who lived by the Kebar River. I sat dumbfounded among them there, where they were living, for seven days.
At the end of seven days the Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, I have <st data-num="05414" class="">appointed</st> you a <st data-num="06822" class="">watchman</st><n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>. Whenever you <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> a <st data-num="01697" class="">word</st> from my <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st>, you must <st data-num="02094" class="">give</st> them <st data-num="02094" class="">a warning</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> me.

When I <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st>, ‘You will <st data-num="04191" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>,’<n id="1" /> and you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02094" class="">warn</st> him—you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01696">speak out</st> to <st data-num="02094" class="">warn</st> the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st> to turn from his <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">lifestyle</st> so that he may <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>—that <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">person</st> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> for his <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st>,<n id="2" /> but I will <st data-num="01245" class="">hold</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">you</st> <st data-num="01245" class="">accountable for</st> his <st data-num="01818" class="">death</st>.<n id="3" />
But as for you, if you warn the wicked and he does not turn from his wicked deed and from his wicked lifestyle, he will die for his iniquity but you will have saved your own life.

“When a righteous person turns from his righteousness and commits iniquity, and I set an obstacle before him, he will die. If you have not warned him, he will die for his sin. The righteous deeds he performed will not be considered, but I will hold you accountable for his death.
However, if you warn the righteous person not to sin, and he does not sin, he will certainly live because he was warned, and you will have saved your own life.”
The hand of the Lord rested on me there, and he said to me, “Get up, go out to the valley, and I will speak with you there.”
So I got up and went out to the valley, and the glory of the Lord was standing there, just like the glory I had seen by the Kebar River, and I threw myself face down.
Then a wind came into me and stood me on my feet. The Lord spoke to me and said, “Go shut yourself in your house.

As for <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, they will <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="05688" class="">ropes</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> you and <st data-num="0631" class="">tie</st> you <st data-num="0631" class="">up</st> with them, so you <st data-num="03808" class="">cannot</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> them.

I will make your <st data-num="03956" class="">tongue</st> <st data-num="01692" class="">stick</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02441" class="">roof of</st> your <st data-num="02441" class="">mouth</st> so that you will <st data-num="0481" class="">be silent</st> and <st data-num="03808 01961">unable</st> <st data-num="0376 03198">to reprove</st><n id="1" /> them, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are a <st data-num="04805" class="">rebellious</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.

But when I speak with you, I will loosen your tongue and you must say to them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says.’ Those who listen will listen, but the indifferent will refuse, for they are a rebellious house.
